title: Student-Loan Forgiveness Plan on Hold: How the Lawsuits Affect You
description:
About 22 million people have signed up for President Biden’s student-loan forgiveness program. But several lawsuits filed against the government have raised questions about when or whether borrowers will be relieved of their debt. WSJ reporter Gabriel T. Rubin joins host J.R. Whalen with some answers.
